Articles.Content:
Pretty simple challenge - complete multiple challenges at the same time (from 2 to... however many you can).

But wait! There is a twist! You have to do them at the same time. For example, you could go with the Jool-5 challenge and... um... the grand tour challenge. Like that guy did.

There are just 2 rules:

1) you must follow the rules set by all of the challenges you chose

2) Have fun

Also, you should say which challenges you chose and (optional) links.

Scoring is simple - whoever does the most challenges at the same time!

Leaderboard:

-

-

-

-

-

Note: If one of the challenges contradicts the other (again, take the Jool-5 challenge and some sort of kerbin exploration challenge) and you somehow still manage to complete it, the challenges will count as 2 each (Jool-5 + KEC = 4 points). But if one says 'All stock' and the other(s) says '(mod name) required', that would equal 0 points.

I hope this seems like a good challenge. I'll make a few edits if this seems boring or something.
